original_text: And I did so in Jerusalem. I not only locked up many of the saints in prison after receiving authority from the chief priests, but when they were put to death I cast my vote against them.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 이런 일을 행하여 대제사장들에게서 권한을 받아 가지고 많은 성도를 옥에 가두며 또 죽일 때에 내가 찬성 투표를 하였고

sentences.original_text: And I did so in Jerusalem.
I not only locked up many of the saints in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 많은 성도들을 감옥에 가두었을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: after receiving authority from the chief priests
but when they were put to death
I cast my vote against them.
